name: Coloball 2002
summary: Coloball 2002 is a turn-based strategy role-playing video game for the PlayStation 2. The game was developed by Vanpool and published by Enterbrain exclusively in Japan on June 27, 2002. The title Coloball is short for "Colosseum Ball," and although the game is touted as a sports adventure game, it is most similar to an RPG board game.
